means: 猜疑（是）( suspect的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Police have released an E-fit picture of the suspected gunman.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方已公布持枪嫌犯的电子画像。

sentence.Network_en: No one suspected the anguish he carried on his shoulders.
sentence.Network_cn: 没人觉察出他所承担的痛苦。

sentence.Network_en: They suspected that Neville had traded secret information with Mr Foster.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们怀疑内维尔和福斯特先生交换了秘密情报。

who exactly did you suspect to be an accomplice ., 你怀疑谁会是同伙呢.

142 I see. 我知道了！143 I suspect. 我怀疑。144 I won't！ 我绝不！
Intelligent as you are , I suspect you will fail ., 尽管你聪明 , 我猜想你会失败.

entry.def: You use suspect when you are stating something that you believe is probably true, in order to make it sound less strong or direct.

example.ex: The above complaints are, I suspect, just the tip of the iceberg...
example.tran: 我想，以上的抱怨只是冰山一角。

entry.def: If you suspect that something dishonest or unpleasant has been done, you believe that it has probably been done. If you suspect someone of doing an action of this kind, you believe that they probably did it.

example.ex: He suspected that the woman staying in the flat above was using heroin...
example.tran: 他怀疑楼上公寓里的那个女人正在吸食海洛因。

example.ex: Police said they suspected that Sobhraj had accomplices who are drug smugglers...
example.tran: 警方说他们怀疑索布拉还有一些走私毒品的同伙。

entry.def: A suspect is a person who the police or authorities think may be guilty of a crime.

example.ex: Police have arrested a suspect in a series of killings and sexual assaults in the city.
example.tran: 警察已经逮捕了一名涉嫌在该市犯下一系列杀人及强奸案的嫌疑犯。

entry.tran: 不可靠的;不可信的;可能有假的;可疑的
entry.def: Suspect things or people are ones that you think may be dangerous or may be less good or genuine than they appear.

example.ex: Delegates evacuated the building when a suspect package was found...
example.tran: 发现可疑包裹后，代表们撤离了这座楼。

example.ex: The firm has taken out adverts in national newspapers to urge customers to return suspect products...
example.tran: 该公司在全国性的报纸上登出广告，催促顾客退回疑似假冒产品。

Sentence.sentence: A search is now under way to confirm the suspected existence of particles of matter that move at a speed greater than light, and therefore, might serve as our passports to the past.
What is Sanjay Kumar suspected of?
He is suspected of having slipped something in Kumar's bag
